CustomField.description: this boolean value is used to help determine the Payroll segmentation and ownership, case 18753934
CustomField.formula: OR (ISPICKVAL( Ethnicity__c,'HA1') ,ISPICKVAL( Ethnicity__c,'HA2') ,ISPICKVAL( Ethnicity__c,'HA3') ,ISPICKVAL( Ethnicity__c,'HA4') ,ISPICKVAL( Ethnicity__c,'HA5'))
CustomField.label: Hispanic Ownership
